CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Status_Date_Complete__c)) ,
Status_Date_Complete__c-CreatedDate
-
/*Find the number of weekend days between the 2 dates*/
(FLOOR((DATEVALUE(Status_Date_Complete__c)-DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))/7)*2
+
IF(AND(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))=1,WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Date_Complete__c))<>7),1,
IF(CASE(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)),1,8,WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))>CASE(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Date_Complete__c)),1,8,WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Date_Complete__c))),2,
IF(OR(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Date_Complete__c))=7,WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))=1),1,
IF(OR(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Date_Complete__c))=1,WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))=7),2,
0)))))
+
IF(OR(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Date_Complete__c))=1,WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Date_Complete__c))=7),DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(Status_Date_Complete__c))+" 00:00:00")+1-Status_Date_Complete__c,0)
+
IF(OR(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))=1,WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))=7),CreatedDate-DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))+" 00:00:00"),0)
, null )
CustomField.label: Total Turnaround Time (No Weekends)
